resumes.text:
John Doe
Software Engineer

Contact: john.doe@email.com | (123) 456-7890 | linkedin.com/in/johndoe

EXPERIENCE
Senior Software Engineer - Tech Company Inc. (2020-Present)
- Developed and maintained microservices using Python and FastAPI
- Led a team of 3 engineers to deliver new features
- Improved application performance by 40% through optimization
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Docker and Kubernetes

Software Developer - Startup Co. (2018-2020)
- Built web applications using React and Node.js
- Collaborated with product team to define requirements
- Reduced page load time by 30% through code optimization

EDUCATION
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
University of Technology (2014-2018)
GPA: 3.8/4.0

SKILLS
Programming: Python, JavaScript, Java, SQL
Frameworks: React, Node.js, FastAPI, Django
Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Git, Jenkins
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis

PROJECTS
E-commerce Platform - Full-stack development using React and Django
Machine Learning API - REST API for predictive models

Jane Smith
Data Scientist

Email: jane.smith@email.com | Phone: (987) 654-3210
GitHub: github.com/janesmith

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Data Scientist - Data Corp (2019-Present)
- Developed machine learning models for customer segmentation
- Implemented NLP pipelines for text classification
- Created data visualizations using Tableau and Python
- Collaborated with engineering team to deploy models

Data Analyst - Analytics Inc. (2017-2019)
- Analyzed large datasets to provide business insights
- Built dashboards for key performance indicators
- Wrote SQL queries for data extraction and transformation

Data University (2015-2017)

Bachelor of Science in Statistics
Math College (2011-2015)

TECHNICAL SKILLS
Programming: Python, R, SQL, Scala
ML Libraries: Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Pandas
Data Tools: Jupyter, Tableau, Apache Spark, Hadoop
Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

CERTIFICATIONS
AWS Certified Data Analytics Specialty
Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer

Alex Johnson
Frontend Developer

- Optimized website performance achieving 95+ Lighthouse scores

Design Institute (2014-2018)
